pathAssistantSteps.info: CA can close the request manually or After 10 days the request is automatically closed (Status Manual or Automatic)
The status is new when the Client replies to the outbound clienteling email sent by CA (Automatic Status)​

The status is Pending when the CA sent an outbound clienteling email and wait for the client response (Automatic Status​), After 10 days, the Status switch automatically to Closed if no Email reply from the client
